lines.text: Maybe he needed a fire to dispose of some of those stickers?
We never found any sticker sheets for <c=#FF0000>Reversing Rune.</c> Could be that's why!
...Doubt it. Can't be hard to get rid of some paper- wouldn't need to set his whole place on fire for that.
Why he'd think about doin' that when a robber's got a gun pointed at his head, I can't guess either.
